description:
http://www.CityTV.nl
http://www.t-dose.org

Paper: 

This talk will discus the state of open source monitoring tooling anno 2015,
It will look at the past, the current stack of favourite tools, it will document an example on how to keep your monitoring infrastructure sane and automated .

And it will also look further at the gaps that need to be closed.
title: Open Source Monitoring in 2015
